TopicTitle: Who’s hyped for the suit picker coming to KSP?

Articles.Content: I know I am like design your on suits that really sweet. I wonder if it’s coming to console as well and that it’s not just for pc even tho we are the supreme race we can’t have everything i don’t but my point is I so excited to see what I and people make and you don’t need a mod anymore.
Not me because i'm still waiting for 1.7 on console.
I will enjoy the suit picker, mostly because I find a lot of amazing suits, but I can’t find the “one”, so it’ll be helpful to make my own.
I am feeling sad for the console guys

they asked on twitter if they should add a spacex demo 2 suit so if they add that to stock i will be happy because i can only get making history and breaking ground working on 1.9 and i tried 1.8 and they broke
